summary: Sysbook Dashboard and Unatienda cleanup fully tested. Dashboard displays all KPI cards (Products, Stock, Value, Alerts, Movements, Pending Orders), active alerts list, grade health bars, recent activity, and Quick Action buttons. Sidebar shows Dashboard as first item under SYSBOOK group. Unatienda StockOrdersTab cleanup verified - CatalogTypeSelector removed, public-only operations, subtitle mentions 'public store'. Backend stock-orders API uses catalog_type=sysbook (not pca).
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/sysbook/analytics/overview returns KPIs (products=25, stock=707, value=$22620)
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/alerts?status=active&limit=5 returns alerts with severity badges
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/analytics/grade-summary returns grade health data
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/inventory/dashboard returns recent movements
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/stock-orders/summary/pending returns pending orders count (total=7)
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/stock-orders returns orders with catalog_type=sysbook
Backend: POST /api/sysbook/stock-orders/shipment creates with catalog_type=sysbook
Backend: GET /api/store/stock-orders?catalog_type=public filters to public orders
Backend: POST /api/store/stock-orders/shipment accepts catalog_type=public
Backend: Sysbook Inventory dashboard still works
Backend: Sysbook Analytics overview still works
Backend: Sysbook Alerts endpoint still works
Frontend: Sysbook Dashboard loads with data-testid=sysbook-dashboard
Frontend: 6 KPI cards visible (Products, Total Stock, Value, Active Alerts, Movements 7d, Pending Orders)
Frontend: Stock Alerts section shows 3 active alerts with severity badges
Frontend: Grade Health bars show 5 grades (G3-G8) with low/out stock indicators
Frontend: Recent Activity shows stock movements with +/- indicators
Frontend: 4 Quick Action buttons work (Inventory, Stock Movements, Analytics, Stock Alerts)
Frontend: Quick Action navigation updates URL hash correctly (#sysbook-inventory)
Frontend: Refresh button present on dashboard
Frontend: Sidebar shows 'Dashboard' as first item under SYSBOOK group
Frontend: Unatienda StockOrdersTab no longer has CatalogTypeSelector
Frontend: Unatienda StockOrdersTab subtitle says 'Manage shipments...for public store'
Frontend: Unatienda StockOrdersTab orders show 'Public' badge only
critical_code_review_comments: SysbookDashboardTab.jsx fetches 5 APIs in parallel (overview, alerts, grade-summary, dashboard, pending) - efficient
KPI cards clickable with data-testid for each (kpi-products, kpi-total-stock, etc.)
Quick Actions use onNavigate prop or fallback to window.location.hash
Unatienda StockOrdersTab hardcodes catalog_type='public' for all operations
Backend stock_orders.py uses CATALOG_TYPE='sysbook' constant consistently
AdminDashboard.jsx correctly places Dashboard as first in SYSBOOK group items array
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_SUPPLIER_DASHBOARD and TEST_PUBLIC_SUPPLIER shipments during backend tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sysbook Dashboard is the admin landing page at /admin#sysbook-dashboard. It combines KPIs from inventory, alerts, stock movements. Dashboard is first item under SYSBOOK sidebar group. Unatienda StockOrdersTab (at /admin#unatienda Stock Mov. tab) is now public-only with no CatalogTypeSelector. Backend /api/sysbook/stock-orders uses catalog_type=sysbook.
